item.title: Storio is helping other businesses unlock more value from solar energy
item.description:
Meet Storio, a French startup that’s focused on providing smart energy storage for commercial and industrial customers. Founded in 2023, the startup raised a €5 million seed round earlier this year (around $5.5 million at current exchange rates) and has signed its first client. Storio believes solar panels have a bright future. But the company […]

item.title: UAE has shown it can guarantee the 'safety and the security’ of chips, G42 CEO says
item.description: The comments come as Washington reportedly continues to weigh limits on advanced chip sales to the Middle East over national security concerns.
